title: Lena Waithe on Spielberg, Time's Up and Virtual Reality
text:
Lena Waithe on Spielberg, Time's Up and Virtual Reality 4:56am IST - 01:37 
Emmy award-winning actress Lena Waithe talks about playing different genders in Steven Spielberg's 'Ready Player One'. Rough Cut - no reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
